title: Why I like JavaScript
snippet: JavaScript is everywhere on the web.
post: JavaScript is everywhere on the web. For that reason I think it is the most important language to learn.

title: CSS Made Easy
snippet: CSS can be a real pain
post: CSS can be a real pain, but here are some tips and tricks to make CSS and you get along better.

title: Ditch That and Use This
post: Are you using Handlebars for server-side rendering? Ditch that and use EJS.
